channel.title: Updates from Andrea Censi's website
channel.description: Site updates from my website and blog.

item.title: Some recent work on bootstrapping
item.description:
Some recent work on bootstrapping:

  • AC, M.Hakansson, R.Murray, "Fault detection and isolation from uninterpreted data in robotic sensorimotor cascades"
  • AC, R.Murray, "Learning diffeomorphism models of robotic sensorimotor cascades"
item.content:encoded:
Some recent work on bootstrapping:

  • AC, M.Hakansson, R.Murray, "Fault detection and isolation from uninterpreted data in robotic sensorimotor cascades"
  • AC, R.Murray, "Learning diffeomorphism models of robotic sensorimotor cascades"

item.title: Final versions for recent papers.
item.description:
Final versions for recent papers:

  • A.C., R.Murray, "Uncertain semantics, representation nuisances, and necessary invariance properties of bootstrapping agents" (ICDL'11)
  • A.C., R.Murray, "Bootstrapping sensorimotor cascades: a group-theoretic perspective" (IROS'11)
  • D.Scaramuzza, A.C., K.Daniilidis, "Exploiting motion priors in visual odometry for vehicle-mounted cameras with non-holonomic constraints." (IROS'11)
item.content:encoded:
Final versions for recent papers:

  • A.C., R.Murray, "Uncertain semantics, representation nuisances, and necessary invariance properties of bootstrapping agents" (ICDL'11)
  • A.C., R.Murray, "Bootstrapping sensorimotor cascades: a group-theoretic perspective" (IROS'11)
  • D.Scaramuzza, A.C., K.Daniilidis, "Exploiting motion priors in visual odometry for vehicle-mounted cameras with non-holonomic constraints." (IROS'11)

item.title: Basic ROS tutorial for incoming summer students.
item.description: A basic tutorial for ROS incoming summer students created by our Scott .
item.content:encoded: A basic tutorial for ROS incoming summer students created by our Scott .

item.title: Finalist for best paper at ICRA
item.description: Our bootstrapping paper ( slides ) was one of the finalists for the best conference paper award at ICRA 2011 in Shanghai. Congrats to the winners (the GRASP lab at UPenn) and the other runner-up (the German DLR, with their robotic arm ).
item.content:encoded: Our bootstrapping paper ( slides ) was one of the finalists for the best conference paper award at ICRA 2011 in Shanghai. Congrats to the winners (the GRASP lab at UPenn) and the other runner-up (the German DLR, with their robotic arm ).

item.title: Draft: Bootstrapping, uncertain semantics, and invariance

item.content:encoded: Some recent work: Bootstrapping, uncertain semantics, and invariance (PDF) . Partial slides now available .

item.title: Draft: A group-theoretic approach to formalizing bootstrapping problems

item.title: Site update
item.description: Added links to slides for most of the papers in the publications page.
item.content:encoded: Added links to slides for most of the papers in the publications page.

item.title: New video about fly research
item.description: Here's a cool video which shows the simulated visual input of a free-flying Drosophila Melanogaster.
item.content:encoded: Here's a cool video which shows the simulated visual input of a free-flying Drosophila Melanogaster.

item.title: Finally updating all these outdated webpages.
item.description: Updated pages: my publications list ; Research interests and recent highlights ; List of recent software projects ; list of favorite quotes .
item.content:encoded: Updated pages: my publications list ; Research interests and recent highlights ; List of recent software projects ; list of favorite quotes .

item.title: PyContracts, a new Python project
item.description: A recent project: PyContracts , a Python package that allows to declare constraints on function parameters and return values. It supports a basic type system, variables binding, arithmetic constraints, and has several specialized contracts (notably for Numpy arrays).
item.content:encoded: A recent project: PyContracts , a Python package that allows to declare constraints on function parameters and return values. It supports a basic type system, variables binding, arithmetic constraints, and has several specialized contracts (notably for Numpy arrays).

item.title: TAing the advanced robotics course
item.description: I'm TAing ME132a-b, "Advanced Robotics: Navigation and vision" , which this year is taught by the Computer Vision Group at Nasa JPL .
item.content:encoded: I'm TAing ME132a-b, "Advanced Robotics: Navigation and vision" , which this year is taught by the Computer Vision Group at Nasa JPL .

item.title: A new website and a ROS wrapper for CSM.
item.description:
CSM moved to Github .

Also, Ivan Dryanovski created a ROS wrapper .
item.content:encoded:
CSM moved to Github .

Also, Ivan Dryanovski created a ROS wrapper .
